title: Just Deserts
author: Author: Aniela Spring
description: Pablo Perez, a Portuguese thirty-five-year-old man, together with his wife and twelve-year-old son Jack, arrives in America in search of the American dream.',

title: The Truth About The Lies
author: Author: Amrit Kaur
description: Imagine falling in love with your kidnapper, but make it darker. That's what happens to Dahlia. This kidnapping has too many stages, hatred, love, whatever they feel in the end.

title: The Playboy's Crush
author: Deborah A. Olaleye
description: In the vibrant heart of Miami, a city where wealth and beauty collide, Shane Williams – a billionaire CEO with a playboy reputation – encounters a woman who makes his heart beat in ways money can't buy

title: Family Fairytales
author: Author:Obooko Publishing
description: Many, many years ago lived an emperor, who thought so much of new clothes that he spent all his money in order to obtain them; his only ambition was to be always well dressed

title: Family Fairytales Collection1
author: Author:Obooko Publishing
description: The first collection of a series of fairytales for all the family. Perfect for parents to read to their children.

title: I FELL IN LOVE WITH A BLIND MAN
author: Author:Nosipho Zondi
description: If nothing saves us from death let our love at least save us from life . i will die peacefully knowing that my most beautiful and my loving wife was in my arms. i love you and I'll love you even after life. He took the last breath and that was the last of it. “go now , they've prepared a place for you . paris is heaven . you'll lay in his arms forever' those were emihle's words . they echoed in my head . i lay on his chest holding his hands . in your arms i'll lay forever and i took one last deep breath . my name is Nosipho Zondi and that's how i fell in love with the blind man.
